{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.13041v1", "title": "QI-MPC: A Hybrid Quantum-Inspired Model Predictive Control for Learning
  Optimal Policies", "summary": "In this paper, we present Quantum-Inspired Model Predictive Control (QIMPC),
an approach that uses Variational Quantum Circuits (VQCs) to learn control
polices in MPC problems. The viability of the approach is tested in five
experiments: A target-tracking control strategy, energy-efficient building
climate control, autonomous vehicular dynamics, the simple pendulum, and the
compound pendulum. Three safety guarantees were established for the approach,
and the experiments gave the motivation for two important theoretical results
that, in essence, identify systems for which the approach works best.", "main_category": "quant-ph", "categories": "quant-ph,math.OC", "published": "2025-04-17T15:55:37Z"}
